Review by Admin

After you submit your product, the admin will review it for quality, accuracy, and completeness before approval.

Step 1: Product Review

The admin carefully checks all submitted details, images, and pricing to ensure accuracy and compliance.

Step 2: Quality Check

Each product is verified for quality standards, description clarity, and image resolution.

Step 3: Feedback

If needed, the admin may send feedback or request changes to ensure your product listing is perfect.
